HomePage.title: Welcome to BitWallet
HomePage.subtitleStart: Buy and Sell Crypto for Cash
HomePage.calcDesc: See instantly how much cash you'll receive for your crypto.
HomePage.howItWorksStep1: 1. Sign up or connect your Web3 wallet.
HomePage.howItWorksStep2: 2. Deposit your crypto into our platform address.
HomePage.howItWorksStep3: 3. Receive Fiat cash in your balance instantly.
HomePage.whereWeWorkDesc: BitWallet is a top-tier global platform. We operate 24/7 completely digitally across 150+ countries delivering fast and secure transactions.
